title: Key to progress
creator_credit: South-East Asia Shell Film Unit, Lionel Cole and Julian Sprio
brief_description: Illustrates the importance of trade in South East Asia, the operation of trade cycles, and the role of money. Points out that trade is not confined to the exchange of goods and produce, but that tourism, the hire of knowledge and experience and even cultural exchanges, constitute a form of trade.
